summary: This document is a correspondence regarding AML compliance alerts related to Jeffrey Epstein and The 2017 Caterpillar Trust. It discusses the clearance of alerts generated for Epstein and the trust, indicating that they are false positives and not related to any fraudulent activities. The urgency of the matter is highlighted due to an upcoming acquisition requiring fund availability.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in the AML compliance review process and is requesting clearance for alerts related to Jeffrey Epstein and The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.

persons.name: Carl Timcke
persons.context: Carl Timcke is responding to Cynthia Rodriguez regarding the AML alerts and confirms that they are false positives.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the grantor of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust and is associated with an AML alert due to his past legal issues.

connections.description: Cynthia Rodriguez and Carl Timcke are both part of the AML compliance team at Deutsche Bank, with Rodriguez requesting clearances from Timcke.
Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in the AML compliance process concerning Jeffrey Epstein's financial activities related to The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.
Carl Timcke is reviewing alerts related to Jeffrey Epstein's financial activities, specifically concerning The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.

events.title: RDC Alerts Generated
events.description: RDC alerts were generated for Jeffrey Epstein and The 2017 Caterpillar Trust, prompting a review by AML Compliance.

events.title: Funds Availability Deadline
events.description: There is an urgency for fund availability due to an upcoming acquisition that requires clearance of the alerts by this date.

keyFacts: The 2017 Caterpillar Trust was created by Jeffrey Epstein and is a grantor retained annuity trust.
Caterpillar Inc. was charged with fraud, but is not related to The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.
Cynthia Rodriguez is requesting urgent clearance for AML alerts due to an upcoming acquisition.
The alerts generated for Epstein were previously cleared as false positives.
The document indicates a relationship between Epstein and the trust, but not with Caterpillar Inc.
